mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (resume_id, project_name, role, start_date, end_date, description) VALUES (#{resumeId}, #{projectName}, #{role}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description});
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET project_name = #{projectName}, role = #{role}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, description = #{description} WHERE project_id = #{projectId};
